short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stream real-time RSS news in a seamless moving ticker directly on your browser's webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TickerTape - Live RSS News transforms how you receive news updates by streaming the latest RSS feeds in a dynamic ticker directly at the top of your browser's webpage. This innovative extension is designed for those who wish to stay informed without the constant need to switch between news websites or apps.

Features:
- Live RSS Updates: Stream the latest news from your chosen RSS feeds directly at the top of any webpage you browse, displaying each update once for a clutter-free experience.
- Customizable Feeds: Easily add, manage, and prioritize RSS feeds via a straightforward popup interface to customize the news that matters most to you.
- Adjustable Speed and Visibility: Control the scrolling speed of the news ticker and use the toggle switch to display or hide the ticker as needed, providing flexibility in how you consume news.
- Sleek Integration: Designed to blend seamlessly into your browsing experience, the ticker offers news at a glance without overwhelming your web page.
